author: nancymarinelli
body: This branch has a modified version of Configuration/PyReleaseValidation/python/relval_steps.py for using the gen-sim produced 7_1_14  and for using by default the BS for nominal collisions 2015 + a modified version of  Configuration/AlCa/python/autoCond.py for using the GTs for 23 and 50 ns with the new BS + a modified version of Configuration/StandardSequences/python/VtxSmeared.py for using the VtxSmearedDefaultKey for NominalCollisions2015
title: 71 x update for2015 bs nm
